text: Today we are learning with the author of the book

Fluent Forever, Gabriel Wyner, who 
speaks eight languages. Aww yeah!

So every week here on Learn English with 
TV Series we help you to understand fast

English without getting lost, without 
missing the jokes, and without subtitles.

So if that sounds like something 
that you would like to be able to do,

be sure to hit that subscribe button and the bell 
down below so you don’t miss a single lesson.

Do you constantly find yourself 
STUCK in your learning?

You are not alone. If you want to finally be 
able to understand and speak fluent English

in the real world, then I highly recommend 
you give our RealLife English App a try!

So first of all, with the app you can speak 
English anytime, anywhere at the touch of the

button and discover other cultures as you connect 
with English speakers from around the world.

Second, you can listen to the full interview 
with Gabe and tons of other teachers and

experts who will help you to become a world 
class English speaker and unleash your highest

potential! And guess what?
It is all free!

I bet this all sounds like a dream, right?
Well now, it’s a dream come true! So give it

a try now. Just click here or 
in the description below now.

Or search for RealLife English in 
the Apple App or Google Play Store.
